message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONDEPENDENTDATAITEM_VERIFICATION_DEPENDENT_DATA_ITEM_CANCELLED
message.locale: The Dependent Item has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONDEPENDENTDATAITEM_XRV_NAME_AND_DETAILS_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: A Dependent Item with the same name already exist for this verifiable data item. Please enter a new name.

message.name: ERR_VERIFICATIONDEPENDENTDATAITEM_FV_NO_APPROPRIATE_PRIVILEGES
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view the details of this verification.
